ygData.subject: Re: Will not sufficient??
ygData.msgSnippet: I have never heard that before. What kind of sword is it? ... From: Howard Chan  To:  Sent: Sunday, June 13,
ygData.messageBody:
I have never heard that before. What kind of sword is it?


----- Original Message -----
From: Howard Chan <hchan@...>
To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 13, 1999 4:58 PM
Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Will not sufficient??


> From: "Howard Chan" <hchan@...>
>
> Does anyone here know why it says "Your will is not sufficient to command
> this weapon" when I swing my sword? Does that mean I cannot wield it or
does
> that mean that my level is not high enough to use its potential powers?
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Looking for your kindred spirit?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Go to ONElist: where kindred spirits connect and stay connected.
